ingredients.ingredient: 1 bunch beets - trimmed, leaving 1 inch of stems attached, greens washed and reserved
1 small onion, halved and thinly sliced

cookingTips: Cook beet roots and greens separately due to different cooking times
Slice beet greens into ribbons to prevent overcooking
Caramelize onions slowly to bring out natural sweetness
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How would you cook both the tender greens and firm roots to achieve the perfect texture for each component?
